features: High Quality - Whole Food Superfood Supplement - Simply Nature's Promise provides you with 42 different fruits and vegetables in 6 easy to take capsules. Each bottle contains 90 superfood capsules. Bottles contain a 30-day supply following recommended daily dosage.
Enriched with Powerful Antioxidants - With added Bilberry. Same polyphenol content as in a single serving of fresh fruits and vegetables.

100% Soy Free - Even More Fruits & Vegetables - Bilberry, Broccoli, Cabbage, Carrot, Cauliflower, Cayenne Pepper, Celery Stalk, Garlic, Kale, Onion, Shiitake Mushroom, Spinach, Sweet Potato, Wheat Grass, Zucchini, Aloe Vera, Apple, Banana, Blueberry, Cherry, Cranberry, Grape, Grapefruit, Lemon, Mango, Orange, Papaya, Pineapple, Raspberry, Strawberry, Tomato, Beetroot, Bamboo Extract, Green Olive Leaf, Grape Seed, Pomegranate, Green Tea Leaf, Bilberries, White & Red Grape, and Orange.

All Natural Benefits - Simply Nature's Promise Fruits & Veggies is perfect for all ages looking to live a better, happier lifestyle. With added Bilberry that is packed with extra antioxidants. Sourced with Real Fruits and Veggies made with all-natural produce, gluten-free, non-GMO, plant-based, keto-friendly, and vegan. We only use the highest and best quality ingredients available.

Full Satisfaction Guarantee - We are here to help you at all costs. We work hard to make quality whole food supplements for you and your family. We are so confident in the quality of our products that if you are not satisfied with your purchase within 30 days, we’ll refund your purchase. Try Simply Nature's Promise Risk Free!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It save my life
reviews.reviewText: This product save my busy daily routine. It increases my energy and wellness levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not A True 90-Day Supply - For Both
reviews.reviewText: Hello Amazon Friends!EDIT 3/10/23: As promised, I am writing whether these supplements are actually 90 capsules in each set. NO! In this second set, I had one (1) extra vegetable capsule and two (2) extra fruit capsules.Now it is confirmed…Simply Nature’s Promise has no quantity control measures in place. You may get extra, may not. There will not be the recommended amount to take at the end of each/either bottle. I want you, Amazon Friends, to know this before deciding to purchase. I wish you well🧡These supplements ain’t cheap but are reasonably priced compared to similar products offered. I purchased this set but did not start taking them for a day or two. Just a side note…I took three vegetable and three fruit capsules as directed every day. Well, Tuesday, February 7, there were two vegetable and one fruit capsule left. Doing the math, I was missing the proper serving for 30 days.I wanted to contact the seller directly because they are a small business. I believe and support small businesses and did not want to write this in a public forum.If this happens to all, and one, two, or three capsules are missing, this company will be making a lot of money very quickly. The customers will be losing out and broke.Regarding taste…I strongly suggest taking the vegetable capsules, as directed, with a lot of water but eating just a bit. If you take the vegetable capsules on an empty stomach and burp, you will taste every vegetable in those capsules. They may be good for you, but vegetable taste is not great. The fruit capsules taste fine.Another note…I suffer from reflux and, the vegetable capsules, every once in a while, cause a little burning in my esophagus. This is why I suggested eating a little something with the vegetable capsules. I take vegetable in the morning and fruit at night. If you take fruit in the morning and vegetable at night, I still suggest putting a little something on your stomach along with the vegetable capsules. JIC…Overall, my only real complaint is being shorted capsules out of both the vegetable and the fruit bottles. Other than that, I do feel better, have more energy, and am not as hungry before taking this supplement. That being said, this is my experience. They are not an appetite suppressant, and I am not taking them for that reason. I am merely stating how this supplement is making me feel.As I wrote, I have one complaint. That complaint can potentially become a problem however, I just received my second set of capsules. I will edit once I get to the bottom of these bottles and let you know what is what.I wish you well Amazon Friends!

These are less expensive than the Brand you see advertised on TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A less expensive alternative to Balance of Nature
reviews.reviewText: The headline says it all. We subscribed to Balance of Nature for a couple years and like the benefits, but the price was always too high. We've been using Simply Nature's Promise for a year now, and the results are *nearly* the same as Balance. I suspect that Balance of Nature is a better product, but this one will do just fine at the price.
